name: Observatory: Galileo
tagline: nodejs / coffeescript  logging framework, foundation for the Observatory suite for Meteor, but can be used standalone.
body:
Base Observatory classes that do not depend on [Meteor](http://meteor.com) and implement a versatile and powerful logging framework for javascript. Written in coffeescript.

Feel free to browse [Detailed API docs](http://here.com) and do checkout full [Observatory Suite!](http://observatoryjs.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
